Centennial Medic PMTC TST W 4W 5 Creature - Bird Cleric 2/2 2 Flying When Centennial Medic enters the battlefield, return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Culinary Artist PMTC TST W 2W 3 Creature - Ox Citizen 2/3 2 Vigilance Whenever Culinary Artist attacks, you get E.
Exorcise Monstrosity PMTC TST W 3W 4 Instant 3 Choose one or both — • Exile target creature you don’t control, then if its power is two or less, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. • Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
Rhythmic Guitarist PMTC TST W 1W 2 Creature - Human Bard
2 When Rhythmic Guitarist enters the battlefield, you get E. EEE, T: Exile target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield at the next end step.
Centennial Crossed Lover PMTC TST R 3R 4 Creature - Citizen 1/1 2 Defender When Centennial Crossed Lover enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it and it has haste until end of turn.
Energetic Bassist PMTC TST R 2R 3 Creature - Human Bard 3/3 2 Defender When Energetic Bassist enters the battlefield, you get E. Pay E: Target creature has haste and loses defender until end of turn.
Rooftop Bystander PMTC TST R R 1 Creature - Fox Citizen 1/1 2 Defender 2R, discard a card, T: Draw a card. When Rooftop Bystander leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
Tengu Fire Shifter PMTC TST R 3R 4 Creature - Bird Bard 2/2 2 Flying, haste Whenever you gain one more E, Tengu Fire Shifter gets +1/+1 until end of turn. At the beginning of combat you may pay EEE: Return Tengu Fire Shifter from your graveyard to the battlefield.
With All Our Heart PMTC TST R 4RR 6 Sorcery 3 After your post combat main phase, there is an additional combat step and additional main phase for one less than the total number of members in your squad. (Your squad contains one creature of each color. Each creature counts as one color.) Creatures you control get +3./+3, have haste, trample and lose defender until end of turn. For the rest of the turn, you may only attack with one creature during combat.
Mark, Idol Singer PMTC TST WR Mark, Magical Boy RW 2 Legendary Creature - Human Bard 2/3 2 Whenever Mark, Idol Singer or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get E. 3, pay EEE: Transform Mark, Idol Singer. --- (Back): Mark, Magical Boy
Mark, Magical Boy PMTC TST WR
2 Legendary Creature - Human Warrior 4/4 2 First strike Whenever Mark, Magical Boy attacks, you may pay EE. When you do, exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield tapped and attacking. --- (Front): Mark, Idol Singer
Spiritfire PMTC TST WR RW 2 Instant 3 As an additional cost to cast Spiritfire, return a creature you control its owner’s hand. Spiritfire deals 3 damage to target permanent and you gain 3 life.
Yousei's Companion PMTC TST M 3W/UU // G 5 Creature - Elk // 4/4 2 Whenever Yousei’s Companion attacks, tap target creature. If you control a legendary druid, that creature doesn’t untap during it next untap step. ---
Tanuki Caretaker PMTC TST RG 4GR/G 6 Creature - Racoon Bear 5/5 2 You may cast creature cards as though they had flash as long as they have a color that could join your squad. (Your squad contains one creature of each color. Each creature counts as one color.) At he beginning of combat on your turn, creatures with power 5 or greater gain trample until end of turn.
Yousei, Nature's Hero PMTC TST UG 1GU 3 Legendary Creature - Human Druid 2/3 2 Vigilance T: Add one mana of any color. 4GU, T: Monstrify target creature you control. (Put two +1/+1 counters on it, then it becomes a Nightmare creature. Whenever you trigger an ability of it, copy it for each time its been monstrified.)
Monstrify Spell PMTC TST UG 1GU 3 Instant 3 Monstrify target creature. It has hexproof until end of turn. (Put two +1/+1 counters on it, then it becomes a Nightmare creature. Whenever you trigger an ability of it, copy it for each time its been monstrified.)
Orochi Kaiju PMTC TST G 4GGG 7 Creature - Hydra 10/10 2 Whenever Orochi Kaiju attacks, create a 3/3 Snake creature token of the color of your choice. Whenever Orochi Kaiju is dealt damage, monstrify another target creature you control. (Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Its also a Nightmare.Whenever you trigger an ability of it, copy it for each time its been monstrified.)
Make My Monster Grow PMTC TST G 4G 5 Instant 3 Monstrify target creature twice. (To monstrify it, put two +1/+1 counters on it, then it becomes a Nightmare creature. Whenever you trigger an ability of it, copy it for each time its been monstrified.)
Kitsune Protector PMTC TST G 1G 2 Creature - Fox Warrior 2/2 2 Vigilance, reach Whenever Kitsune Protector deals damage to a player, destroy an artifact or enchantment they control.
Hot Springs Troop PMTC TST G 2GG 4 Creature - Monkey 4/4 2 Haste During you untap setup, you may choose not to untap Hot Springs Troop. If you do, create a copy of Hot Springs Troop.
Friendly Kappa PMTC TST G 2G 3 Creature - Turtle Spirit 2/3 2 Whenever Friendly Kappa is dealt damage, search your library for a basic land and put into the battlefield tapped. Shuffle.
Soaring Cranes PMTC TST U 2U 3 Creature - Bird 3/1 2 Flying Whenever Soaring Cranes attacks, another target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Rhino Beetle PMTC TST U 1U 2 Creature - Rhino Insect 1/3 2 Whenever Rhino Beetle attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.

Containment Kekkai PMTC TST W 2W 3 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant Creature When Containment Kekkai enters the battlefield, hush the enchanted creature. (Hushed creatures are colorless and lose all abilities.) Enchanted creature can’t attack or block.
